title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA HILUX (2005 – 2015) – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPERATOR KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA HILUX (2005 – 2015) – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPERATOR KIT

Western Filters Toyota Hilux (2005 – 2015) Fuel Manager Pre-filter Water Separator Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Fuel Manager 30 Micron Vehicle Specific Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:

  • Toyota Hilux 3.0L Turbo Diesel D4D (2005-2015)

This filter unit is to be used as a pre-filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Vehicle application includes those with Dual Battery. Kit includes very detailed fitting instructions, explaining where to fit it.

Kit FM612DPK Includes:

  • 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager – Made by Stanadyne in the USA (Filters down to 30 Microns !)
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts.
  • 1 Mtr of 3/8″ Quality Fuel hose.
  • Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket.
  • 3/8″ Straight Barb fittings.
  • 2x Blanking Plugs.
  • Hose Clamps
  • Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

To check out the full range of products available for your Hilux, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
